pages.text: Perhaps due to the unique madness of dark wizards, you mixed some extremely toxic substances with rice, creating this toxic meal that's hard for you to swallow.$(br)After enduring the disgusting taste and strong toxicity from multiple consumptions, you found your body has developed adaptability to its strong toxicity.$(br)Of course, forcing it into someone else's mouth is also a good choice.

Can be fed to other creatures. Grants the player (or victim) Nausea (100s), Poison X (100s), Weakness V (100s)$(br)Immune to nausea after 5 consumptions, immune to poison after 10, immune to weakness after 15. Right-clicking on other entities can give them the same buff and consume the item.

A meal with all five poisons, eating it requires great effort to overcome hesitant fear.$(br)Although consuming it can gain antibodies to diseases, most people probably wouldn't want to eat it that many times.$(br)Luckily, it can still be used as a weapon to smear into others' mouths.
